titleStmt.title: The opinion of Peter Turner Doct: in physicke, concerning amulets or plague cakes whereof perhaps some holde too much, and some too little.
titleStmt.author: Turner, Peter, 1542-1614.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Read] for Edward Blount,

notesStmt.note: Print faded and show-through; title page marked and stained.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
